step: Choose a steak to grill.
Find a rub recipe from a cookbook or online.
Make the rub.
Apply the rub to the steak.
Let the steak rest.
Grill the steak.
Finished.
task: How to Apply a Steak Rub

step: Place all of the ingredients into a mixing bowl.
Mix to combine thoroughly.
Sprinkle the rub across the steak.
Cook the steak as usual.

step: Use a dry rub or seasoning instead of straight salt and pepper.
Try out a wet marinade for a softer, more-flavorful steak.
Slather your steak with a pat of butter for a rich steakhouse meal.
Top your steak with something special to make a meal of it.

step: Rub herbs and spices into your steak for taste.
Submerge your steak in a flavored liquid.
Place your kangaroo steak in a plastic or glass bowl and cover it with plastic wrap.
Place your steak in the fridge and let it marinate overnight.
Mix the dry ingredients.
Add the butter.
Add the milk.
Prepare to steam.
Cook the spotted dick.
Serve.
